channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road edge crumbling, 6th June
item.description:
The edge of the road surface has crumbled away for a length of about 5M. This is just after the narrow bit of the road on the bend just down from the football club. This causes drivers to take avoiding action that could lead to a head on accident. This has been getting worse over several months.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kayte Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 6th June
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed please cut back overgrown hedge an vegetation growing out into footway back to the boundary appropriately 25 meters (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 6th June
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed please trim back overhanging tree branches over footway 3000x3000mm (Overgrown Tree)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A series of potholes along the left edge going towards Chruchdown., 5th June
item.description:
A series of potholes along the left edge running for about 50 yards, travelling towards Churchdown. On Chelt Road East, just before the golf course, on the bend and dip of the road. Particularly difficult to avoid as the cycle link has narrowed the main road, and when the traffic is busy.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Frog Furlong Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dinnerplate sized pothole in right-hand lane approaching Zoon's Court roundabout, 5th June
item.description:
Roughly around WhatThreeWords: remain.parts.nation Difficult to avoid if turning right, particularly at night if not aware of it already.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree growing over the pavement and the bus shelter next to it is covered in ivy., 5th June
item.description:
On Gotherington Lane opposite Hardy Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gotherington Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The temporary lights are only letting 3-4 cars through in one direction and causing huge tailbacks of traffic. Since installed and despite moving has been a problem all the time, 5th June
item.description:
Just past the spitfire home development entrance towards Stoke Orchard. Since the lights have been there, it has caused huge tailbacks and unacceptable delays in getting through due to the lights being set to too short a time in one direction. People are jumping the lights due to frustration and delays
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Orchard Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light head is facing wrong direction

item.title: Failure to maintain verge, 5th June
item.description:
One side of Bournside Close is a grass verge. Two of us maintain it from Warden Hill Road as far as the copse of trees halfway along. Can you or your agent handle the rest please? The entire verge is your responsibility, but we do what we can. Please can you let me know when this Close is scheduled for maintenance; my email is peterisom142@gmail.com
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Warden Hill Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
